item.title: Live Updates: Gazans Make Long Trek Home as Cease-Fire Holds
item.description: Palestinians began arriving in northern Gaza, months after Israel ordered them to flee. The Israel-Hamas truce was holding after it appeared to falter...

item.title: Rebels Backed by Rwanda Announce Capture of Key City in Eastern Congo
item.description: The M23 militia, funded and directed by Rwanda, said it had seized the city of Goma, terrifying its people, many of whom sought shelter there after fl...

item.title: E.U. Prepares to Cautiously Pare Back Sanctions on Syria
item.description: Member countries’ foreign ministers are meeting to discuss a “road map” to lift financial restrictions, but any change will happen in stages.
